briefTitle: An 18 Week Efficacy and Safety Study of Saxagliptin and Metformin XR Combination in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
officialTitle: 18-Week, Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Blind 3b Trial to Evaluate Efficacy/Safety of Saxagliptin in Combo With Metformin XR 1500mg vs Metformin Uptitrated to 2000mg in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Who Have Inadequate Glycemic Control After Diet/Exercise and a Stable Dose of Metformin XR 1500mg
summary: The purpose of this study is to compare reduction in A1C for subjects taking Saxagliptin and Metformin XR vs. uptitrated Metformin XR.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in HbA1c Level From Baseline to Week 18 (LOCF)
